Html:
The download-link http://wpf.codeplex.com/releases/view/40535#DownloadId=106541 seems to be broken.

Instead of 1763 KB the file has a size of only 2KB. When I execute it, I get the message "Dieses Installationspaket konnte nicht geöffnet werden. Lassen Sie den Hersteller der Anwendung überprüfen, ob es sich um ein gültiges Windows Installer-Paket handelt."

("The installation package could not be opened. Please verify the creator of the application and check if it is a valid Windows Installer-Package.")

 

Does anyone else has this problem or is it a problem of our firewall?
